item.title: LeetCode-219.存在重复元素II
item.description: https://leetcode-cn.com/problems/contains-duplicate-ii/ class Solution { public boolean containsNearbyDuplicate(int[] nums, int k) { HashMap<Integer, Integer> hashMap = new HashMap<>(); for(int i = 0; i < nums.length; i++) { int num = nums[i]; if(hashMap.containsKey(num)) { return true; } hashMap.put(num, null); if(hashMap.size() > k) { hashMap.remove(nums[i - k]); } } return false; } }
